name: test_e2e_with_logs[403_HHI_ABS_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HHI_ABS_001` |
| **Name** | Absolute URL Host override |
| **Category** | HOST_HEADER |
| **Subcategory** | absolute_url |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `x-original-host:https://evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `x-original-host%3Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fevil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~26000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:33.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Host Header] Host header injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Host Header] Host header injection attempt detected test_id=HHI_ABS_001-1772277093433-od6595 pattern_id=HHI_ABS_001 uri=/?q=x-original-host%3Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fevil.com client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
